groups.name: Smoke-n-Whiskey
groups.title: Smoke 'n Whiskey
groups.bio_raw: **Team Mission:** Continuing the Momentum tradition in a social, outdoor fire circle setting. **Meeting Information:** We meet Thursday nights 7:30 - 10:00 in Palo Alto. **About the Team:** Supporting longer-time Momentum members in a second more social phase. **Our Standards:** • Consult before visiting. • BYOB • Be flexible. **Status as a Tempo Team:** Smoke and Whiskey contributes regular Tempo: • Breakfast **Membership and Visitor Status:** Open to visitors with prior arrangement. Open to new members.
groups.bio_cooked:
Team Mission: Continuing the Momentum tradition in a social, outdoor fire circle setting.

Meeting Information: We meet Thursday nights 7:30 - 10:00 in Palo Alto.

About the Team: Supporting longer-time Momentum members in a second more social phase.

Our Standards: • Consult before visiting. • BYOB • Be flexible.

Status as a Tempo Team: Smoke and Whiskey contributes regular Tempo: • Breakfast

Membership and Visitor Status: Open to visitors with prior arrangement. Open to new members.
groups.membership_request_template: Team membership generally requires consensus of the team members.

groups.name: GreatX
groups.title: GreatX
groups.bio_raw: GreatX, May 2018 **Team Mission:** To help our members to have a better life, with deeper and more meaningful relationships. GreatX supports members when they need support but we're not always about growth exercises — we enjoy a balance between work and play, that camaraderie is an important element of team work and play. **Meetings:** We meet on Mondays from 6:30-9:00 pm, at various locations in the South Bay. Some members bring dinner and come early for some socializing. We're open to having visitors and rotators as long as they are as handsome, wealthy, and charismatic as the team members are. **[Team Standards](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yK8G3MGUE1Lo0r_F0dNFlC8Q2CQpff16UQ9-HH-pEdU/edit?usp=sharing)** **Status as a Tempo Team:** We give back to Momentum and grow stronger as a team by committing to hosting breakfast. **Membership and Visitor Status:** GreatX is open to visitors by prior arrangement and is not presently seeking new members. **Members:** * Howard Bailey * Matt Hill * Dave Mahal * Brad Milliken * Moe Rubenzahl * Joe Sabolefski * Bob Silver * Geoff Wright **Distant members:** * Baruch Deutsch * Brad Peppard _GreatX camping trip September 2010 (with ex-members Joe, Marco, Mark, Francis, and mascot Colby)_
groups.bio_cooked:
GreatX, May 2018

Team Mission: To help our members to have a better life, with deeper and more meaningful relationships. GreatX supports members when they need support but we’re not always about growth exercises — we enjoy a balance between work and play, that camaraderie is an important element of team work and play.

Meetings: We meet on Mondays from 6:30-9:00 pm, at various locations in the South Bay. Some members bring dinner and come early for some socializing. We’re open to having visitors and rotators as long as they are as handsome, wealthy, and charismatic as the team members are.

Team Standards

Status as a Tempo Team: We give back to Momentum and grow stronger as a team by committing to hosting breakfast.

Membership and Visitor Status: GreatX is open to visitors by prior arrangement and is not presently seeking new members.

Members:

  • Howard Bailey
  • Matt Hill
  • Dave Mahal
  • Brad Milliken
  • Moe Rubenzahl
  • Joe Sabolefski
  • Bob Silver
  • Geoff Wright

Distant members:

  • Baruch Deutsch
  • Brad Peppard

GreatX camping trip September 2010 (with ex-members Joe, Marco, Mark, Francis, and mascot Colby)
groups.membership_request_template: Team membership generally requires consensus of the team members.

groups.name: RetiredEdge
groups.title: RetiredEdge
groups.bio_raw: **Team Mission:** Our Team is a valued resource and connection for Men that are retired or planning for retirement. We collectively bring and share compelling and thought-provoking content and experience through our lifelong connections and learnings as we boomers jump off the treadmill in search for more meaning in our lives. **Meeting Information:** We meet the second Thursday of the month from 12:00 - 2:00, at a minimum. Additional _ad hoc_ meetings and adventures are also scheduled to pursue fun and rewarding Team activities. Venues for these meetings will change to accommodate the activity we have chosen to do. **About the Team:** Retired Edge started in 2016 and currently has upwards of 17 members, many of whom are also members of other teams. Retired Edge is open to any Momentum member who has retired from a full time career or is partially retired, or seriously contemplating near-term retirement. **Our Standards:** • Show up to meetings on time, • Inform the group advance if you have to miss a meeting. • Come prepared to “tell on yourself” – be ready to reveal your most pressing issues • Be prepared to listen during shares, focusing your full attention. **Status as a Tempo Team:** We give back to Momentum and grow stronger as a team by committing to: • Breakfast • Content • Fun • Proving Grove **Membership and Visitor Status:** Retired Edge is open to visitors and new members in keeping with it's theme and standards. Certain activities may also be open to general Momentum membership if the topic is one we feel could benefit a larger circle of Men.
groups.bio_cooked:
Team Mission: Our Team is a valued resource and connection for Men that are retired or planning for retirement. We collectively bring and share compelling and thought-provoking content and experience through our lifelong connections and learnings as we boomers jump off the treadmill in search for more meaning in our lives.

Meeting Information: We meet the second Thursday of the month from 12:00 - 2:00, at a minimum. Additional ad hoc meetings and adventures are also scheduled to pursue fun and rewarding Team activities. Venues for these meetings will change to accommodate the activity we have chosen to do.

About the Team: Retired Edge started in 2016 and currently has upwards of 17 members, many of whom are also members of other teams. Retired Edge is open to any Momentum member who has retired from a full time career or is partially retired, or seriously contemplating near-term retirement.

Our Standards: • Show up to meetings on time, • Inform the group advance if you have to miss a meeting. • Come prepared to “tell on yourself” – be ready to reveal your most pressing issues • Be prepared to listen during shares, focusing your full attention.

Status as a Tempo Team: We give back to Momentum and grow stronger as a team by committing to: • Breakfast • Content • Fun • Proving Grove

Membership and Visitor Status: Retired Edge is open to visitors and new members in keeping with it’s theme and standards. Certain activities may also be open to general Momentum membership if the topic is one we feel could benefit a larger circle of Men.
